name: The Transformers

info_box.别名:: 戦え!超ロボット生命体トランスフォーマー
info_box.播放电视台:: 首播联卖（美国）；CITV, Sky One, Fox Kids, Pop and Kix! （英国）
info_box.制作:: Sunbow Entertainment、Marvel Productions、東映アニメーション、AKOM
info_box.导演:: Andy Kim、Bob Kirk、Al Kouzel、Terry Lennon、Bob Matz、Norm McCabe、Margaret Nichols、Karen Peterson、Tom Ray、Robert Shellhorn、Bob Treat、Ray Lee、John Gibbs、John Walker、Jaeho Hong

summary: This poster shows several Transformers, including Optimus Prime, Megatron, Slipstream, and Bumblebee. In the middle it says "Transformers". This poster measures approx. 24" x 36" Transformers are fictional alien robots and the titular characters of a popular Hasbro toy line and its spin-offs. They come from the planet Cybertron and are divided into the heroic Autobots, led by Optimus Prime, and the evil Decepticons, led by Megatron. They are able to "transform", rearranging their bodies into a common and innocuous form, such as a car, aircraft, or animal.
complaints: 记住这个博派狂派怎么打都不会死的年代
部分问题情节迷惑得像在发疯......
一切的开端，但是评分还是要抛开滤镜。
我的第一部机器人动画
和柯南、奥特曼陪伴我度过童年的作品，小时候对这类题材的动画还是非常喜欢得，个人评价7.5/10
配弹幕给的乐子很多，同样是放松大脑所以为什么一堆人宁愿看厕纸也不看这种古早片子。
顶端时代的顶端偏下作品
从动画的角度上讲鸡万属于屑作 但奈何故事有趣以及情怀加持
推不出去了，但我自己看着不错
